newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 33.164 (33.230).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 33.164 (33.230).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 33.164 to the dollar after Thursday's fixing at 33.230, and at 19.609 to the mark from 19.616.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at exactly 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.67 percent, after a deviation of -0.78 percent on Thursday.
At the time of the calculation, the crown was trading on the interbank market at -1.96 versus the basket.
